text: Ursula Karusseit (2 August 1939 - 1 February 2019) was a German actress.Ursula Karusseit gestorben Der Spiegel, 1 February 2019 She was born in Elbing, West Prussia, Nazi Germany. Karusseit was known for her roles in Ways across the Country and in KLK Calling PTZ â€“ The Red Orchestra.
